comment: Pros : A ton of good songs. Cons : It's so annoying when I click on my playlist, and some random song starts playing. Like, I want to listen to MY music, not whatever Spotify is adding for me. It would totally be 5 stars if Spotify would take out that feature, cause I don't want to pay 30 dollars a month just to listen to ONLY my music.
the function of activity: The activity involves searching, library function, playing/pausing items, viewing downloaded songs/podcasts, downloading songs or podcasts, adding to playlists, shuffling a playlist, connecting to devices, previewing episodes, type replies to episodes and accessing history page, setting page
the sub-task list of state: [{'name': 'Download playlist', 'description': 'Download playlist'}, {'name': 'Pin Playlist', 'description': 'Pin Playlist'}, {'name': 'Delete playlist', 'description': 'Delete playlist'}, {'name': 'Share Playlist', 'description': 'Share playlist'}, {'name': 'Show Spotify Code', 'description': 'Show spotify code'}]
